activities: We provide a cloud platform for processing and analyzing genomic data.  We collect our clients' personal info to be able to run our service, contact them and communicate with them regarding the service, and charge for our service.  we also receive third parties' genomic data in order to be able to process and analyze it on our clients' behalf.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: client data, third parties' data processed on behalf of clients. includes some manually processed data.
